Edmonton Open Practice Sessions

Friday Open Sessions

Practice sessions are open to all ages and skill levels. Bboys, Bgirls, Freestylers and Choreographers are welcome to come, play their music and share the studio space.

Friday nights from 7:00 - 10:00 PM
